name: natty-sched
description: Natural language scheduler with autocomplete - Parse human-readable schedules to JSON, calculate next run times, and get smart suggestions. Supports 'every 3 days', 'weekdays at 9am', 'first Monday of month', with typo tolerance and 95+ templates.

scripts.test: node test.js && node test-comprehensive.js && node test-calculator.js && node test-autocomplete-comprehensive.js
